name: tech-asia
description: A news site about tech stuff in Asia. A project that enables me to recap what I learned from The Odin Project about Webpack and a few other minor things I learned along the way such as... * Prettier * Sass * [Coolors](https://coolors.co/ "Coolors") * Pure JavaScript, no jQuery * [Figma](https://www.figma.com/ "Figma") * Git using Bash
